channel.title: Anyone having this problem with youtube?
channel.description:
First it was down, and now there are weird links instead of the normal ones when watching a video.
And when I try to comment on one I get logged out and redirected to the login screen every time.
I hope this ain't some kind of phishing thing cuz then I'm fucked already O.O

item.title: Anyone having this problem with youtube?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:6, topic:438505”]Youtube’s had issues ever since Google bought it.[/quote]^ this not to mention the servers are crappy now for some reason

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone having this problem with youtube?
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

nope. i don’t have that.

the only problem i have is that some videos use some different flash movie player or something that is really fucked up, for instance if i want to increase the volume using my keyboard and i’ve set the video to fullscreen, it just unfullscreens (or however you call that) it and bugs him out.

Read full topic
